input.issue: Analyze capabilities of Kubernetes resource: CustomResourceDefinition

output:
{
  "capabilities": [
    "custom resource definition (CRD)",
    "API extension (expose new resources on the API server)",
    "OpenAPI v3 schema validation",
    "custom validation rules (x-kubernetes-validations)",
    "versioning (served/storage flags)",
    "conversion webhook (webhook client config, conversionReviewVersions)",
    "subresource: status",
    "subresource: scale (specReplicasPath, statusReplicasPath, labelSelectorPath)",
    "additional printer columns",
    "field selectors for custom resources (selectableFields)",
    "naming controls (kind, plural, singular, shortNames, categories)",
    "deprecation and warnings",
    "preserve unknown fields and structural schema extensions (x-kubernetes-*)"
  ],
  "providers": [
    "kubernetes"
  ],
  "abstractions": [
    "API extension framework",
    "schema-validated custom types",
    "multi-version support with optional webhook conversion",
    "subresource exposure (status, scale)",
    "custom output columns",
    "field selection support"
  ],
  "complexity": "medium",
  "description": "Defines and registers new resource types with the Kubernetes API server, including schema validation, versioning, and optional webhook-based conversion and subresources.",
  "useCase": "Create custom, schema-validated APIs inside Kubernetes for operators/controllers and users to manage domain-specific resources.",
  "confidence": 0.9
}
